title: Configuration
description: This schema validates the initial configuration for the network generator application.

network.description: Defines the network and its topology to be generated.

outputFolder.description: The relative path (folder name only) of the directory, where the generated files are stored.

generationTasks.description: Defines the files to be generated.

name.description: The name as identification for humans. For the pattern explanation, please see: https://regex101.com/r/3ER25H/1

host.description: The host exposing a northbound REST interface.

version.description: A version sting in format 'v0.0.0' to be used in TMF APIs.

center.description: Defines the geographical center of the Radio Access Network.

disabledResourcesProfile.description: A definition how many resource in percentage should be disabled for each network resource type (e.g. O-DU, Cell, ...). The value is network topology node type (resource type) individual per type.

operationalState.description: Defines enumerated operational states aligned with ITU-T usage. Please see ITU-T M.3100: 'Generic Managed Entities' and ITU-T M.3160: 'Generic Management Information Model'

pattern.description: A description of the relations between O-RAN Objects.

latitude.description: The latitude of the geographical location in decimal degrees. Please note 0.00001° is about 1.11m.

longitude.description: The longitude of the geographical location in decimal degrees. Please note 0.00001° is about 1.11m.

aboveMeanSeaLevel.description: The height of the geographical location in meters.

pattern.description: A description of the relations between O-RAN Objects.
pattern.title: pattern

tower.description: A 'tower' offers mounting positions of O-RUs.
tower.title: tower

representation.description: A fixed value for information only.

smo.description: Definition of the relation to SMO children.
smo.title: Service Management and Orchestration

fiveGCoreCount.description: The number of 5G-Cores controlled by SMO.

nearRtRicSpiralRadius.description: The spiral radius of hexagons within an hexagon grid defines the number of nearRtRics and the geographical coverage of the SMO.

oCloudResourcePoolCount.description: Number of O-RAN O-Cloud resource pools managed by O2-controller of the SMO.

nearRtRic.description: Definition of the relation to nearRtRic children.
nearRtRic.title: nearRtRic

oRanCuSpiralRadius.description: The spiral radius of hexagons within a hexagon grid defines the number of O-RAN CUs and the geographical coverage of the SMO.

oRanCu.description: Definition of the relation to oRanCu children.
oRanCu.title: oRanCu

oRanDuSpiralRadius.description: The spiral radius of hexagons within a hexagon grid defines the number of O-RAN DUs and the geographical coverage of the SMO.

oRanDu.description: Definition of the relation to oRanDU children.
oRanDu.title: oRanDu

towerSpiralRadius.description: The spiral radius of hexagons within an hexagon grid defines the number of towers and the geographical coverage of the oRanDU. This means that center tower offers the O-Cloud resource pool for the surrounding towers and its oRanRus.

fronthaulGatewayCount.description: Number of fronthaul gateway connected to an oRanDU.

oRanRuCount.description: Number of oRanRus managed by an oRanDU.

oRanRu.description: Definition of the relation to oRanRu children.
oRanRu.title: oRanRu

nrCellDuCount.description: Number of 3GPP:NRCellDUs managed by an oRanRu.

nrCellDu.description: Definition of the relation to 3GPP:NRCellDU children.
nrCellDu.title: nrCellDu

sectorCount.description: Number of sectors managed by an 3GPP:NRCellDUs.

cellAngle.description: The area covered by an NRCellDU around the tower in grad.

cellScaleFactorForHandoverArea.description: A factor to increase the cell polygon for handover areas in procent [%]

maxReach.description: The maximal distance a UE can reach the cell in meters. The value also defines the radius around a tower where UEs may select a NRCellDU of an oRanRu mounted at this tower.

enabled.description: If true, an export file is created.

compressed.description: If true, the export file is stored in a compressed format.

rfc8345.description: If enabled, an ietf-network-topology file will be generated.

day0Config.description: If enabled, an ietf-network-topology network subdirectory file structure is generated.

svg.description: If enabled, a svg file will be generated.

kml.description: If enabled, a kml file will be generated.

rfc7946.description: If enabled, a geojson file will be generated.

teiv.description: If enabled, a teiv data file will be generated.

tmf632.description: If enabled, a json file will be generated according to TMF632 party.

tmf633.description: If enabled, a json file will be generated according to TMF633 service catalog.

tmf634.description: If enabled, a json file will be generated according to TMF634 resource catalog.

tmf686.description: If enabled, a json file will be generated according to TMF686.

o-ran-sc-network:smo.description: Defines a minimum of how many SMOs in the topology should be disabled.

o-ran-sc-network:o-cloud.description: Defines a minimum of how many o-cloud resource pools in the topology should be disabled.

o-ran-sc-network:tower.description: Defines a minimum of how many towers in the topology should be disabled.

o-ran-sc-network:near-rt-ric.description: Defines a minimum of how many Near-Rt-RICs in the topology should be disabled.

o-ran-common-identity-refs:o-cu-function.description: Defines a minimum of how many O-CUs (combining O-CU-UP and O-CU-CP) in the topology should be disabled.

o-ran-common-identity-refs:o-du-function.description: Defines a minimum of how many O-DUs in the topology should be disabled.

o-ran-common-identity-refs:o-ru-function.description: Defines a minimum of how many O-RUs in the topology should be disabled.

o-ran-sc-network:cell.description: Defines a minimum of how many Cells in the topology should be disabled.

OperationalState.description: Enumerated operational states aligned with ITU-T usage (e.g., M.3100 and M.3160). References: ITU-T M.3100: 'Generic Managed Entities', ITU-T M.3160: 'Generic Management Information Model'
